item.title: How Old Are Elphaba & Glinda In Wicked
item.description: Elphaba and Glinda, the two main characters from the Broadway musical, are played by Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande in the Wicked movie.

item.title: Hugh Grant's New 2024 Horror Movie Becomes His Top 5 Best-Rated Movie Ever On Rotten Tomatoes
item.description: Heretic, the new religious horror movie from A24, has become one of Hugh Grant's best movies ever, at least according to Rotten Tomatoes.

item.title: Terrifier 3 Introduced A Dangerous New Demonic Villain Sienna Can Fight Next
item.description: Lauren LaVera's Sienna Shaw had a brief vision in Terrifier 3 that showed her yet another hellish entity that could resurface to torment her.
